'''''Amon Hen'' 255''' is the two-hundred-and-fifty-fifth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in September [[2015]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''Alatar''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Chairman's Additional 'Thank You'
** By: [[Shaun Gunner]]
* Announcements
* Advert: [[Beyond Bree]] Calendar for 2016
* [[Rath Dínen]]: Rikki Breem
** By: [[Charles Noad]] and Jessica Yates
* Namárië Rikki
** By: [[Chris Crawshaw]]
* All Brân
** By: Ian Spittlehouse
* The Burning [[Palantíri|Palantír]] 15
** By: Ian Collier
* [[Hall of Fire]]
** By: Verne Walker
* 1934 Sketch of [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] Re-discovered after 70 years
** By: Michael Flowers
* Ooo Errr what HAVE I got in my pockets?
** By: Mick Henry
* Artwork: ''[[Trolls]]''
** By: Jef Murray
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Ian Collier
* Hobbit Seed Cake Recipe
** By: Ellen Walker
* Report: Tolkien Society Seminar 2015
** By: Michael Fielder
* Review: ''The Road, Taken''
** By: Lynn Forest-Hill
* Review: ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey: Chronicles: Creatures & Characters]]''
** By: [[Shaun Gunner]]
* Review: ''[[A Tolkien Treasury (miniature edition)|A Tolkien Treasury]]''
** By: [[Shaun Gunner]]
* Mathom
** By: Jan Boom
* News From [[Fangorn Forest|Fangorn]]
** By: Carol Brownlow
* Artwork: ''The pony and the wizard''
** By: Jef Murray
* Michael's Miscellany
** By: Michael Flowers
* New Members
* Artwork: ''[[Peregrin Took|Pippin]] and the [[Uruk-hai|Uruk-Hai]]''
** By: Anne Gavitt
* Committee
